From this post:

Root Mode: This mode is only available if you have an eligible set of parts selected. Activating root mode will allow you to select another part (from the children of the selected set) to attach by. It will reflow the hierarchy much like docking does, so the selected part becomes the new root of the hierarchy. This one is particularly useful for subassemblies and such.
Great plugin! You saved my hard work. Keep it alive

until .90 comes out, this is the best mod ever when it comes to improving construction options, before the other mod i use, editor extensions, lets me actually rebuild craft with a new tree when needed.

Personally, id like the game to allow loops in construction for extra rigidity (2+ docking ports should act as a solid loop and allow fuel crossfeed thru both ports ect), but until then, this is a massive improvement in general.
